channel.title: CVE Feed for MotoPress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MotoPress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2844|2024-08-03T00:52:59.219Z -- motopress -- timetable%20and%20event%20schedule
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in MotoPress Timetable and Event Schedule up to 1.4.06. This affects an unknown part of the file /wp/?cpmvc_id=1&cpmvc_do_action=mvparse&f=datafeed&calid=1&month_index=1&method=adddetails&id=2 of the component Calendar Handler. The manipulation of the argument Subject/Location/Description leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-206487.

item.title: CVE-2022-2843|2024-08-03T00:52:59.527Z -- motopress -- timetable%20and%20event%20schedule
item.description: A vulnerability was found in MotoPress Timetable and Event Schedule. It has been rated as problematic. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php of the component Quick Edit. The manipulation of the argument post_title with the input leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be launched remotely. VDB-206486 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-29914|2024-08-02T18:29:50.367Z -- motopress -- stratum
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MotoPress Stratum allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Stratum: from n/a through 1.3.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-39630|2024-08-01T20:38:48.944Z -- motopress -- timetable%20and%20event%20schedule
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in MotoPress Timetable and Event Schedule allows Object Injection.This issue affects Timetable and Event Schedule: from n/a through 2.4.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-29914|2024-03-27T07:04:45.729Z -- motopress -- stratum
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MotoPress Stratum allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Stratum: from n/a through 1.3.15.
